title.loginDescription: Please sign-in to your account and start the adventure
title.registerDescription: Make your app management easy and fun!

error.unknown: Unknown error occurred. Please try again later!

title_homePage.makingEveryStudentUnstoppable_DetailFirs: At Quizroom, we believe that anyone can learn anything. All it takes is a tenacious spirit, the right guidance, and the tools to see it through. We know that students are under more pressure than ever. It can leave them overwhelmed, be anxiety-producing and make it all too easy to burn out.
title_homePage.makingEveryStudentUnstoppable_DetailSeco: It's out job to give every students the tools and confidence to succeed, no matter what their motivation, or what they're striving to achieve.
title_homePage.fromSingleClassroomToSchools: From a single classroom to schools around the world
title_homePage.fromSingleClassroomToSchools_Detail: What started as a simple tool has grown into seven different study modes, tools to help teachers get the most out of their students, and activities to help classes learn and have fun together. And that’s just the start. We’re working on unleashing the magic of one-on-one learning for every student, shaping the future of personalized learning through an assistant to help guide and motivate every learner.

quote_homePage.quote1: Quizroom makes studying a breeze! No more huge stacks of flashcards, no more lost notes. I am so thankful I found this study tool!
quote_homePage.quote2: I tend to procrastinate studying for tests, if I study at all. Using Quizroom has helped me actually want to study because it has proven successful in preparing me for my tests.
quote_homePage.quote3: I LOVE QUIZROOM!! It really helped me to ensure that I had an interactive way to study that prevented me from getting bored.

advantages_homePage.vastContentLibrary_content: It boasts a vast library of user-generated study materials, including flashcards, quizzes, and study sets, covering a wide range of subjects and topics.
advantages_homePage.customizable_Flashcards_content: Users can create their own flashcards with text, images, and audio, tailoring study materials to their specific needs.
advantages_homePage.collaborative_Learning_content: Users can collaborate with classmates and teachers by sharing study sets, fostering a sense of community in learning.
advantages_homePage.effective_Study_Strategies_content: Quizroom promotes active recall, spaced repetition, and other research-backed study techniques.

contactUs_homePage.contactUs_content: We are here to ensure you have the best learning experience.

updateFeatures_homePage.content1: Find flashcards on any subjects you need to learn
updateFeatures_homePage.content2: Learn with improved questions, more control and hints
updateFeatures_homePage.content3: Test mode with AI-enhanced hints and study guidance
updateFeatures_homePage.weekStreak_content: study in the next 7 days to keep your streak going!
